verses.name: Jeremiah 27:9
verses.text: Therefore hearken not ye to your prophets, nor to your diviners, nor to your dreamers, nor to your enchanters, nor to your sorcerers, which speak unto you, saying, Ye shall not serve the king of Babylon:

verses.name: Jeremiah 27:10
verses.text: For they prophesy a lie unto you, to remove you far from your land; and that I should drive you out, and ye should perish.

verses.name: Jeremiah 27:11
verses.text: But the nations that bring their neck under the yoke of the king of Babylon, and serve him, those will I let remain still in their own land, saith the Lord; and they shall till it, and dwell therein.
